channel.title: Almost done with makin a server i need help how 2 compile.bat and runserver.bat
channel.description:
all i need to do is compile.bat and runserver.bat it said 1.Go to ure source 2.Then u need to search for: compile.bat and runserver.bat
i downloaded the testscape and when i open it its in notepad like the guide said but how do i fine the compile.bat and runserver.bat???
plz help me thanks
